snippet: International education professionals in the United States are starting to focus on ways to prevent foreign students from dropping out of colleges.

byline.original: By KARIN FISCHER | THE CHRONICLE OF HIGHER EDUCATION

lead_paragraph: International education professionals in the United States are starting to focus on ways to prevent foreign students from dropping out of colleges.

headline.main: Helping Foreign Students Thrive on U.S. Campuses
headline.print_headline: Helping Foreign Student Thrive on U.S. Campuses
